name: Get off Mah Track: The Game
name_original: Get off Mah Track: The Game
description:
This is a LD47 based on the theme "Stuck in a loop".

You're stuck on a looped bit of track. Shoot the vandals while some cheesy country music plays. It's great I promise.

Controls:

Mouse cursor - aim

Spacebar - jump (Use this to jump over tracks that are on fire)

R - Track repair screen (Uses points accumulated to repair damaged tracks)

LMB - shoot

Have fun shooting varmit!
